DialogueNode.dialogue: Hi Richard. Can I talk to you about something?
I talked to some more employees and they specifically said that Stan's conduct lately has been highly inappropriate.
Apparently, an employee even left early in tears one day due to Stan's actions. And, worse yet, this seems to have happened before.
Oh, goodness. That sounds absolutely horrible. I can't believe Stan would conduct himself in such a manner...
Unfortunately I wasn't at the meeting, but if these allegations are true, maybe you should consider confronting Stan.
I trust you to get to the bottom of this.
